resources.string: My Tour Guide to Riyadh KSA
a clay and mud-brick fort, with four watchtowers that has been built in around 1865 in the center of Riyadh.
Ain Heet cave or Dahl Heet is one such with an underground lake in its interior chambers.
The ruins of the old city of Diriyah which was the capital of the first Saudi state
Of the best malls in Riyadh and they have all the top brands, as well as have a branch of the Virgin stores. The market features a variety of restaurants.
One of the most popular malls in Riyadh. Three level shopping mall. Has coffee shops located around the lake, restaurants and huge amuzement park for kids.
a shopping mall located in the eastern ring road highway (airport direction)
is a muslim holiday where muslims spend it with joy renewing there brotherly bonds. and the whole country celebrate dressing up in beautiful lights and fun events for the whole family
is a cultural and heritage festival held in Jenadriyah, every Famous regions of KSA along with the Arabian Gulf countries and a guest country show there historical heritage
serves Saudi traditional food in a very traditional atmosphere
